name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2: Additional Content Pack 1
summary:
This DLC will add the following items:
・Change Dungeon: Rebeat Resort
・Plan: V Crystal Ring
・Plan: Vita Ring
・Plan: LL Ring
・Plan: Pop-up Ring
・Key Fragment

It will also add the following content:
・Increase level cap by 300
・A new Colosseum battle is available
